using Oxygen.Editor.Data;
using Oxygen.Editor.Data.Settings;
using System;
using System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations;
using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;

#nullable enable

namespace Testing;
public sealed partial class Inner
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Setting descriptors for Inner properties.
    /// </summary>
    internal static class Descriptors
    {
        public static readonly SettingDescriptor<string> Nested = new()
        {
            Key = new SettingKey<string>(ModuleName, nameof(Nested)),
            DisplayName = null,
            Description = null,
            Category = null,
            Validators = new ValidationAttribute[] {  },
        };
    }
}

/// <summary>
/// Module initializer that registers Inner descriptors on assembly load.
/// </summary>
file static class InnerInitializer
{
    [System.Runtime.CompilerServices.ModuleInitializer]
    internal static void Initialize()
    {
        EditorSettingsManager.StaticProvider.Register(Inner.Descriptors.Nested);
    }
}
